Package com.quackology.duckdevices.spaces.manifolds

Class CompoundManifold

java.lang.Object
com.quackology.duckdevices.spaces.manifolds.CompoundManifold
All Implemented Interfaces:
Space
public class CompoundManifold extends Object implements Space
Compound manifold class for combining multiple manifolds

Technically can be the value of a manifold :0

  • Method Details

    • phi

      public CompoundManifold phi(Linear[] tangent)
      Applies the phi map to the entire compound manifold
      Parameters:
      tangent - an array of tangent elements ordered in the same way as the manifolds in the compound manifold
      Returns:
      a compound manifold containing the manifold elements from the mapping of the current compound manifold and given array

    • phi

      public CompoundManifold phi(Linear tangent)
      Applies the phi map to the entire compound manifold

      Only works if the tangent elements are vectors

      Parameters:
      tangent - the vector containing every tangent space stacked on top of each other
      Returns:
      a compound manifold containing the manifold elements from the mapping of the current compound manifold and given vector

    • phi_inverse

      public Linear[] phi_inverse(CompoundManifold compoundManifold)
      Applies the phi_inverse map to the entire compound manifold
      Parameters:
      compoundManifold - the compound manifold to map with
      Returns:
      an array of tangent spaces ordered in the same way as the manifolds in the compound manifold

    • phi_inverse_vector

      public MatReal phi_inverse_vector(CompoundManifold compoundManifold)
      Applies the phi_inverse map to the entire compound manifold

      Only works if the tangent elements are vectors

      Parameters:
      compoundManifold - the compound manifold to map with
      Returns:
      a vector containing every tangent space stacked on top of each other
